name: Bunny Ice Cream Maker
description:
Originally created for Ludum Dare 42 game jam. Theme: Running out of space.

1 to 5 local players.  Supports keyboard and controllers.

In this silly micro game, a frantic team of rabbits must make ice cream but when the ice cream machine breaks and spills ice cream everywhere, they have to eat it to keep the machines running!  But they can only eat so much without going to the toilet, while the toilet teleports around the map.

Yeah it makes no sense...

"The toilet is the best thing in this game" - play tester

----

Tutorial

Step 1:  One to five players!  Use keyboard or controller to join! Press space or A button to jump or double jump

Step 2: Make ice cream!  Press E on keyboard or B on controller on red buttons.  Change all 6 red buttons to green to make ice cream cone

Step 3: Oh no, the ice cream is leaking!  Eat it or we’ll run out of space and the ice cream maker will break! Hold E on keyboard or B on controller near ice cream to eat it

Step 4: Oh no, you are too full!  Use the toilet! Press E on keyboard or B on controller near toilet
